meanings.definition: The period of time before the regular season begins in sports.
meanings.sent1: During the preseason, teams practice and prepare for the upcoming games.
meanings.sent2: Fans enjoy watching their favorite teams play in the preseason games.
meanings.sent3: The preseason is like a warm-up before the main event.
meanings.sent4: In the preseason, players are like eager students ready to learn and improve.
meanings.sent5: Coaches use the preseason to assess the skills of new players.

meanings.definition: A series of games or events that take place before the official season starts.
meanings.sent1: The preseason matches help teams determine their strongest lineup.
meanings.sent2: Players often feel excited and motivated during the preseason.
meanings.sent3: Some fans attend preseason games just to see their favorite players up close.
meanings.sent4: The preseason is a preview of the intense competition to come.
meanings.sent5: During the preseason, teams experiment with different strategies.
